entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:15 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 09:23 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
